title: Fan art - Arcade Riven (With color)
body: I try too draw Arcade Riven with color. :) {{champion:92}}

replies.body: Why Scam? Its the link for my fan art?

> [{quoted}](name=Inseptable,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=i958M0ty,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-03-01T16:42:41.992+0000)
>
> Why Scam? Its the link for my fan art?

Because I clicked the link and it wants my league log in
Ok but that is the link for my fan art , and I dont know why you come to your login page?

Yeah it did the same thing for me. Made me log in after I was already logged in. Weird.
Awesome art though!! :D

Nope, not a scam link! 

Reuploading here - 

http://imgur.com/oACneHf

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=i958M0ty,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-03-01T23:25:19.987+0000)

> Nope, not a scam link!
